item.title: LeetCode 763. Partition Labels 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 將字串 s 分段，同一字母只能在一段中出現。Partition the string into as many parts as possible so that each letter appears in at most one part.

item.title: LeetCode 976. Largest Perimeter Triangle 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 以現有長度組合出最大面積的三角形。Return the largest perimeter of a triangle with a non-zero area, formed from three of these lengths.

item.title: LeetCode 561. Array Partition I 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 計算 input array 中任意兩數 $min$ 後的 $max$ 值。Return the sum of $min(a_i, b_i)$ for all $i$ is maximized.
